THE UNIVERSITY OF NEBRASKA LINCOLN, NEBRASKA 68508
OFFICE OF THE DIRECTOR UNIVERSITY OF NEBRASKA PRESS

opener.salute: Dear Mr. Neihardt and Mr. Young:

div1.p: Enclosed are agreements which I have just received in the mail from Hilda Petri. These were incomplete.

On the contract for WHEN THE TREE FLOWERED please have Mr. Neihardt initial below where I have initialed the change in royalty rate. Please also ask Dr. Neihardt to sign the contract in the line on page 3 indicated by the mark "X".

On the contract for THE SPLENDID WAYFARING please have Mr. Neihardt initial the line where I have initialed the change in royalty rate. Please also ask Dr. Neihardt to sign the agreement on page three on the line marked "X".
Please return all copies to me. When our officers have signed I will send, as directed, the author's copies to Mrs. Hilda Petri.
Thank you and may I say how nice it was to see you last Saturday.

closer.signed: UNIVERSITY OF NEBRASKA PRESS Bruce Nicoll
